instructions.title: Mix eggs and vanilla
instructions.text: Mix the eggs with the vanilla sugar in a large bowl

instructions.title: Add flour and milk
instructions.text: Slowly add 375 grams of flour to the egg mixture, mixing with small amounts of milk. Repeat until all the flour and milk is used.

instructions.title: Cook the pancakes
instructions.text: Melt butter in a pan. Drop a spoonful of the mixture onto the pan. Cook the pancake, flipping it once. Repeat steps until all the mixture is used.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.text: Serve the pancakes with powdered sugar or vanilla sauce on top.
